2005.context: Paycom Software, Inc. is a HCM software company focused on payroll, HR, and talent management for enterprises. Single-database HCM platform development.

competitors.name: ADP (Automatic Data Processing)
competitors.notes: Market leader with approximately 10% market share, dominant in payroll processing across all business sizes

competitors.name: Paychex
competitors.notes: Major payroll services provider with approximately 9% market share, strong in SMB market

competitors.name: Ceridian
competitors.notes: Payroll and HR services company, operating traditional service bureau model

competitors.name: Ultimate Software
competitors.notes: HR and payroll software provider, beginning transition to cloud-based solutions

competitors.name: Kronos
competitors.notes: Workforce management and time/attendance solutions provider

competitors.name: PeopleSoft/Oracle
competitors.notes: Enterprise HCM platform being acquired by Oracle in 2005

competitors.name: Sage Payroll
competitors.notes: Payroll software for small to medium businesses

competitors.name: Paychex

2020.context: Paycom Software, Inc. is a HCM software company focused on payroll, HR, and talent management for enterprises. Beti employee-driven payroll. Automation focus.

competitors.name: ADP
competitors.notes: Market leader in payroll and HR services

competitors.name: Paychex
competitors.notes: Major payroll provider for small and mid-sized businesses

competitors.name: Paylocity
competitors.notes: Direct competitor in mid-market cloud HCM

competitors.name: Ceridian Dayforce
competitors.notes: Cloud HCM platform competitor

competitors.name: Ultimate Software
competitors.notes: Merged with Kronos in 2020 to form UKG

2024.context: Paycom Software, Inc. is a HCM software company focused on payroll, HR, and talent management for enterprises. AI-powered HR automation. GONE time-off management.

competitors.name: Paylocity
competitors.notes: Top choice for larger businesses, full suite merging payroll with HR management, recruitment, compliance, global payroll in 100+ countries via Blue Marble integration

competitors.name: Gusto
competitors.notes: Best for small/midsize businesses, outstanding payroll with basic HR, hundreds of integrations, no hidden costs, more affordable than Paycom

competitors.name: ADP Workforce Now
competitors.notes: Go-to for complex payroll demands, global payroll/HR in 51 countries, 700+ tool integrations, broader compliance and learning support

competitors.name: Paycor
competitors.notes: Closest match to Paycom in structure/pricing/target market, fully integrated payroll and HR for midsize (10-5,000 employees), better mobile app and reporting

competitors.name: Rippling
competitors.notes: Consolidates HR, IT, and finance in single platform, advanced automation, analysis, and reporting, automates entire employee lifecycle

competitors.name: Workday
competitors.notes: Leading enterprise cloud application for HCM, payroll, and financial planning, 600+ pre-built integrations, greater scalability than Paycom

competitors.name: BambooHR
competitors.notes: HR-first platform with payroll as add-on, easy-to-use for employee records, benefits, time off, hiring, performance management

competitors.name: Paychex Flex
competitors.notes: Strong human support with compliance professionals and 600+ dedicated HR Business Partners

competitors.name: Papaya Global
competitors.notes: For global workforce management, payroll services in 160+ countries

competitors.name: UKG
competitors.notes: Ultimate Kronos Group, enterprise workforce management and HCM

2025.context: Paycom Software, Inc. is a HCM software company focused on payroll, HR, and talent management for enterprises. Single-database HCM leader. Competing with Workday, ADP.

competitors.name: ADP
competitors.notes: Largest payroll provider with comprehensive HCM solutions for all company sizes

competitors.name: Paylocity
competitors.notes: Direct competitor in cloud HCM targeting mid-market companies

competitors.name: Dayforce (Ceridian)
competitors.notes: Unified HCM platform competing in mid-market and enterprise

competitors.name: Workday
competitors.notes: Enterprise HCM and financial management platform for large organizations

competitors.name: Paychex
competitors.notes: Payroll and HR services primarily for small to mid-sized businesses

competitors.name: UKG
competitors.notes: HCM and workforce management from Ultimate and Kronos merger

competitors.name: Paycor
competitors.notes: HCM and payroll solutions targeting mid-market companies

competitors.name: Rippling
competitors.notes: Modern HR platform combining payroll, benefits, and IT management
